ValidationRule.description: LoA Status cannot be changed to G4 Submission if Approval Stage is Draft
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", OR( ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c, "Offer in Progress" ), ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName, "Create Offer (Bid)" ) ), RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteEditRecordTypeId, ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, "Draft"), ISPICKVAL(LOA_Status__c, "G4 Submission") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “G4 Bypass” can only be set after shopping cart finalization, Pricing Alignment flag has been set, proposal has been place “In Review”
